allow: Bash(npx turso db shell age-boys --url "libsql://age-boys-braiantroncoso.aws-us-east-1.turso.io" --auth-token "eyJhbGciOiJFZERTQSIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJhIjoicnciLCJpYXQiOjE3NjUzMTY3NDEsImlkIjoiYzQxZDJjM2EtZWI3OC00ZDhkLWIwNzEtZjZiYTI4MjY2NTQwIiwicmlkIjoiODkxNTk3YWItNjdmMS00NDkxLTk1ZjItODEwYmU3OWNkMTFlIn0.NrirvlVTesOfJjoOKB3eMHYI8VA16K6UaFN3-K5ppS-Ius2-mHdZfymcSPtNvAKfCuYPoO_4amaRk6dCPmbkCw" "SELECT m.id, m.matchType, m.playedAt, GROUP_CONCAT(u.username || '':'' || mp.isWinner || '':'' || mp.eloChange) as participants FROM matches m JOIN match_participants mp ON m.id = mp.matchId JOIN users u ON mp.playerId = u.id GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.playedAt DESC;")
